text: aur tumhaaree dasha us stree jaisee na ho jaaye, jisane apana soot kaatane ke pashchaat udhed diya. tum apanee shapathon ko aapas mein vishvaasaghaat ka saadhan banaate ho, taaki ek samudaay doosare samudaay se adhik laabh praapt kare. allaah is[1] (vachan) ke dvaara tumhaaree pareeksha le raha hai aur pralay ke din tumhaare lie avashy use ujaagar kar dega, jisamen tum vibhed kar rahe the
